27 //ROS
28 #include <ros/ros.h>
29 #include <tf/transform_broadcaster.h>
30 #include <sensor_msgs/CameraInfo.h>
31 #include <sensor_msgs/Image.h>
32 #include <nav_msgs/Odometry.h>
33 #include <pluginlib/class_loader.h>
34 
35 //global variables used
36 ros::Time image_time;
37 ros::Time last_time;
38  double x = 0.0;
39  double y = 0.0;
40  double th = 1.57-1.57/4;
41  double th_initial=1.57-1.57/4;
42 
43 class SubscribeAndPublish_odom
44 {
45 public:
46  SubscribeAndPublish_odom()
47  {
48  //Topic you want to publish
49  pubh_odom = nh_odom.advertise< nav_msgs::Odometry>("/stereo/odom", 1);
50 
51  //Topic you want to subscribe
52  subh_odom = nh_odom.subscribe("/odom/miro", 1, &SubscribeAndPublish_odom::callback, this);
53  }
54 
55  void callback(const nav_msgs::Odometry& input)
56  {
57  nav_msgs::Odometry output;
58  output=input;
59 
60 
61 
62  double vx = input.twist.twist.linear.x/230;
63  //double vx = 0.0;
64  double vy = 0.0;
65  double vth = input.twist.twist.angular.z;
66 
67  ros::Time current_time;
68  current_time = ros::Time::now();
69  //std::cout<<vth<<"vth\n";
70 double absvth = vth >0?vth:-vth;
71 
72  if ( absvth > 0.0) {
73  //std::cout<<vth<<"vth inside if\n";
74  vx=0;
75  }
76  //compute odometry in a typical way given the velocities of the robot
77  double dt = (current_time - last_time).toSec();
78  double delta_x = (vx * cos(th) - vy * sin(th)) * dt;
79  double delta_y = (vx * sin(th) + vy * cos(th)) * dt;
80 
81 
82  double delta_th = vth * dt;
83  double ph = 3.14;
84  double roll = 1.57;
85 
86 
87  x += delta_x;
88  y += delta_y;
89  th += delta_th;
90 
91  //since all odometry is 6DOF we'll need a quaternion created from yaw
92  geometry_msgs::Quaternion odom_quat_odom = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(roll,ph,th_initial);
93 // geometry_msgs::Quaternion odom_quat_odom = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(roll,ph,th_initial);
94  geometry_msgs::Quaternion odom_quat_tf = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(th);
95 
96  //first, we'll publish the transform over tf for the body relative to fixed map frame
97  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped odom_trans;
98 
99  odom_trans.header.stamp = current_time;
100  odom_trans.header.frame_id = "map";
101  odom_trans.child_frame_id = "miro_robot__miro_body__body";
102 
103  //miro_robot__miro_head__eyelid_lh
104  odom_trans.transform.translation.x = x;
105  odom_trans.transform.translation.y = y;
106  odom_trans.transform.translation.z = 0;
107  odom_trans.transform.rotation = odom_quat_tf;
108  //then, we'll publish the transform over tf for point cloud.
109  //Point cloud is fixed on the 'Stereo' frame which is fixed to the left eye frame as described by Stereo_image_proc
110 
111  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped odom_trans_stereo;
112  odom_trans_stereo.header.stamp = odom_trans.header.stamp;
113  odom_trans_stereo.header.frame_id = "miro_robot__miro_head__eyelid_lh";
114  //odom_trans_stereo.header.frame_id = "miro_robot__miro_body__body";
115  odom_trans_stereo.child_frame_id = "stereo";
116 
117 
118  odom_trans_stereo.transform.translation.x = 0;
119  odom_trans_stereo.transform.translation.y = 0;
120  odom_trans_stereo.transform.translation.z = 0;
121  odom_trans_stereo.transform.rotation = odom_quat_odom;
122 
123  //send the transform
124  odom_broadcaster.sendTransform(odom_trans);
125  odom_broadcaster.sendTransform(odom_trans_stereo);
126 
127  //next, we'll publish the odometry message over ROS
128  output.header.stamp = current_time;
129  output.header.frame_id = "map";
130 
131  //set the position
132  output.pose.pose.position.x = 0;
133  output.pose.pose.position.y = 0;
134  output.pose.pose.position.z = 0.25;
135  output.pose.pose.orientation = odom_quat_odom;
136 
137  //set the velocity
138  output.child_frame_id = "stereo";
139 
140  last_time = current_time;
141  pubh_odom.publish(output);
142  }
143 
144 private:
145  ros::NodeHandle nh_odom;
146  ros::Publisher pubh_odom;
147  ros::Subscriber subh_odom;
148  tf::TransformBroadcaster odom_broadcaster;
149 
150 };//End of class SubscribeAndPublish

153 class SubscribeAndPublish_r
154 {
155 public:
156  SubscribeAndPublish_r()
157  {
158  //Topic you want to publish
159  pubh_r = nh_r.advertise<sensor_msgs::CameraInfo>("/stereo/right/camera_info/", 1);
160 
161  //Topic you want to subscribe
162  subh_r = nh_r.subscribe("/yaml/right/camera_info/", 1, &SubscribeAndPublish_r::callback, this);
163  }
164 
165  void callback(const sensor_msgs::CameraInfo& input)
166  {
167  sensor_msgs::CameraInfo output;
168  output=input;
169  //output.roi.x_offset=0;
170  //output.roi.y_offset=0;
171  //output.roi.height=240;
172  //output.roi.width=140;
173  //output.height=240;
174  //output.width=140;
175  output.header.stamp = image_time;
176  output.header.frame_id = "right";
177  pubh_r.publish(output);
178  }
179 
180 private:
181  ros::NodeHandle nh_r;
182  ros::Publisher pubh_r;
183  ros::Subscriber subh_r;
184 
185 };//End of class SubscribeAndPublish

198 
199  void callback(const sensor_msgs::Image& input)
200  {
201  sensor_msgs::Image output;
202  output=input;
203  image_time=ros::Time::now();
204  output.header.stamp = image_time;
205  output.header.frame_id = "right";
206  //output.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
207  pub_r.publish(output);
208  }
209 
210 private:
211  ros::NodeHandle n_r;
212  ros::Publisher pub_r;
213  ros::Subscriber sub_r;
214 
215 };//End of class SubscribeAndPublish

282 int main(int argc, char **argv)
283 {
284  //Initiate ROS
285  ros::init(argc, argv, "subpub");
286 
287  //Create objects of class SubscribeAndPublish_** that will take care of everything
288  SubscribeAndPublish_r SAPObject_r;
289  SubscribeAndPublish_IMG_r SAPObject_IMG_r;
290  SubscribeAndPublish_l SAPObject_l;
291  SubscribeAndPublish_IMG_l SAPObject_IMG_l;
292  SubscribeAndPublish_odom SAPObject_odom;
293  ros::spin();
294 
295  return 0;
296 }
